Name: Sapper Robot
About the game: 'Sapper Robot' is a classic 2D horror game. The main goal is to neutralize explosives on all levels by controlling a robot. Collect them while avoiding the enemies. Just remember to keep an eye on the lighting. People's lives depend on your work! The age of robots and robotics is coming. Now people do not have to defuse explosives on their own. There are robots for this, without risking your life you need to control the robot and neutralize all levels. Be careful - the robot should not fall into the hands of bandits. Game Features: Tense atmosphere Beautiful Pixel Art Steam Achievements support Nice OST Challenging gameplay
